'''Brightwood "Concord" Bed''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Brightwood "Concord" Bed is obtainable by buying the Gnostic Chorus package of the [[Battle Pass/A Previous Life|A Previous Life]] Battle Pass.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=90}}.
